name: .PCF File Extension
summary: Learn about .PCF files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: Font format used by PaintCAD, a drawing program developed for Java-enabled mobile phones; contains a series of bitmap images for the characters in the font; used for typing text within PaintCAD.

content: NOTE: PaintCAD is designed primarily for mobile devices. Since it is a Java program, it will only run on a computer if Java is installed.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
